bwwExcerpt: Overall, “A Beautiful Noise” is not — to borrow from the “Sweet Caroline” fan chant — “so good, so good, so good,” but rather “so meh.” It fails to pass the one test that all jukebox bio musicals must face — which, of course, is whether it can rise above being something just for die-hard fans.

keyPhrases.quote: Overall, "A Beautiful Noise" is not — to borrow from the "Sweet Caroline" fan chant — "so good, so good, so good," but rather "so meh."
